indications: Topical corticosteroids are indicated for the relief of the inflammatory and pruritic manifestations of corticosteroid-responsive dermatoses.
contraindications: Apply a thin film of Betamethasone Valerate Cream USP, 0.1% to the affected skin areas one to three times a day. Dosage once or twice a day is often effective.
warningsAndPrecautions: Betamethasone Valerate Cream USP, 0.1% is supplied in 15 gram (NDC 51672-1269-1) and 45 gram (NDC 51672-1269-6) tubes.
adverseReactions: Topical corticosteroids are contraindicated in those patients with a history of hypersensitivity to any of the components of the preparation.
name: BETAMETHASONE VALERATE
